alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft; Pikes Peak above 11000 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 10 at 12:51PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Fremont, southeastern Teller, central El Paso and north central Pueblo Counties through 115 PM MDT... At 1250 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms extending from near Gleneagle to Falcon to near Fountain to 10 miles north of Penrose. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Colorado Springs, Fountain, Monument, Air Force Academy, Manitou Springs, Hanover, Yoder, Black Forest, Ellicott, Schriever AFB, Security, Security-Widefield, Falcon, Stratmoor, Gleneagle, Fort Carson, Peterson AFB and Cimarron Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
